text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar If Alex is doing such an excellent job, why is he no where to be seen or found?  The media does not have to create a perception of chaos and havoc; it is in plain sight for all to see.  Advice: let Alex speak at your Coronavirus rallies and you should self-quarantine./
